TEXT.S: Antonio Anderson sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1985, ryax sa tay 5 nqu tay 6, Antonio Anderson, biru na p'unro. pinqbaqan nya Antonio mqwas biru sa Lynn Vocational pqwsan biru seneng (Lynn, Massachusetts). Antonio, t'aring kawas tay 2005 tehuk kawas tay 2009, mqwas biru sa Memphis pqwsan biru krahu.
